title: For All You Have Left
description: "This is certainly one of my favorite love stories ever." ~A Novel Review"A MUST-READ!" ~Nancy's Romance Reads"5 Stars!" ~Back Porch Romance Book Reviews"Unputdownable." ~Southern Belle Book BlogLogan Cross married her high school sweetheart when she was eighteen. But life had different plans for Logan, and now, at twenty-two, she is in the midst of starting over when Jorgen Ryker moves in next door. Jorgen suspects that Logan might be hiding a few secrets, but neither he nor Logan is ready when she reveals her biggest secret from her pastâ€”a secret that neither of them realizes they share.Set in small-town Missouri, For All You Have Left is a hope-filled love story centering on three lives, two great loves and one epic journey in learning to love again.
author: Laura     Miller
